message: Created comprehensive clinical_examples_catalog.md with 22 concrete examples: schizophrenia spectrum (clanging dialogue, schizoaffective case, brief psychotic case, 4 delusional disorder types with full cases), all 10 personality disorders with celebrity examples and case descriptions, and 3 treatment examples (A Clockwork Orange aversion therapy, CBT social anxiety, Beck's triad). Each example includes full text, what it demonstrates, mechanisms, and why it's useful for ADHD-friendly explanations.

key_examples: All delusional disorder subtypes with full cases
Celebrity examples for each personality disorder
